COMPANY_RESET_ACCORDION.TITLE: Company Reset
COMPANY_RESET_ACCORDION.DESCRIPTION: You will be able to delete all the records you have created (customers, products/services, receipts, banks/cash, invoices, etc.) using the "RESET ACCOUNT" button. You can recover the reset data by contacting us within 14 days. If you do not contact us, your data will be permanently deleted after 14 days.
